modName: Menu music - La chanson du Pyrobarbare - Bob Lennon
summary: Make the Bob Lennon\'s song the menu of skyrim. (Met la musique de Bob Lennon - La chanson du Pyrobarbare en musique du menu de Skyrim.)
descriptionHtml:
(For englishs ; i\'ll not make an english description. You can found the YT video below in french description. This mod makes the Bob Lennon\'s song the menu music of skyrim. I explain who is Bob Lennon after french description)

Bonsoir ! Je suis Bob Lennon. Ha-ha !
Combien de fois cet intro nous fait tous rêver devant notre écran...
Vous kiffez Bob Lennon ? Vous aimez son playthrough sur Skyrim ? (Playlist : http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL89A711C53A33F2E4 )
Vous avez entendu sa musique La chanson du Pyrobarbare ?

(Music link here)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7ZAzp9UtxXo

Vous voulez en faire votre menu de Skyrim ?
Vous en rêviez ? Chuck Norris l\'a fait.
Euh, non, c\'est moi. Hyrul.

Ce mod met la magnifique chanson qu\'il a chanté avec sa copine Kelly (non il ne sort pas avec Lydia, Lydia n\'est qu\'un tas de pixel), qui d\'ailleurs à une voix sublime (Non Bob, je drague pas ta copine... ARGH ! NON ! PAS LA BOITE DE COUSCOUS !! Ouf... NON ! PAS LES PROFONDEURS ABYSSALES DES ABYSSES PROFONDES !) en menu. 

VOIR AUSSI :
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22685] Blood and Dark - Hide armor Retexture [/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5076] Menu music - Dovahkiin - Metal remix [/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6292] LevelUp sound replacement - Morrowind\'s Levelup [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8467] Better and Younger Lydia [/url]

Remerciez moi ! 
Contact ; Skype pseudo \"hyruul\"
06 40 19 ... Euh, non. xavdu16@hotmail.fr pour le mail.


For english community - Who is Bob Lennon ?
Bob Lennon is a famous minecraft player, he makes videos with TheFantasio974. (Fanta)
Fanta and Bob makes another YT channel, where they play other games than minecraft, and Bob Lennon started a playthrough on skyrim. It makes a real success (170 episodes today), he\'s a barbarian, and french community likes to watch him play this amazing game.
He improvised a song, on the menu with another mod (Power metal song them, or something like this) and the french community like it, so he made a real song with his wife, and this song makes another REAL success (link of the video in description)
So i decidate to make a mod to make this song the song menu of skyrim, for real fans. 
Oh and, his nickname is NOT because he likes John Lennon. He didn\'t know him when he found this nickname.
author: Hyrul

files.name: Menu music replacer Bob lennon s song

files.changelogHtml: Coupage de la fin de la chanson : les deux petites secondes où l\'on voit l\'image que j\'ai uploadé sur la vidéo.
